remarks: Lemma for ~ dvalvec .  (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-2013.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2014.)
statement:
dvalvec.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvalvec.v $e |- U = ( ( DVecA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvalveclem.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvalveclem.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) $.
dvalveclem.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvalveclem.d $e |- D = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
dvalveclem.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
dvalveclem.p $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` D ) $.
dvalveclem.m $e |- .X. = ( .r ` D ) $.
dvalveclem.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
dvalveclem $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) -> U e. LVec ) $.
